document.forum_title: San Francisco Chronicle - Bay Area news, sports, tech, food - San Francisco Chronicle
document.discussion_title: Hearst Castle closes as Central Coast fire nears
document.topic_text: Photo: Joe Johnston, AP Smoke from a wildfire billows Saturday from a ridge line behind famed facade of Hearst Castle in San Simeon, Saturday, Aug. 20, 2016. A growing wildfire in central California has forced the closure of the historic Hearst Castle. Fire officials say the blaze was about 3 ½ miles from the hilltop estate on Saturday. Smoke from a wildfire billows Saturday from a ridge line behind... Hearst Castle crews and state firefighters rushed to protect the popular Central Coast tourist attraction Sunday from a 27,500-acre blaze sweeping across San Luis Obispo County.
